name: BIRBHUMIR GRAMEEN UNNAYAN SOCIETY
briefDescription: Birbhumir Grameen Unnyan Society (BiGUS) has completed proudly upto 2010 session. Self sustainable model has been carried out at the beginning of the year. Our various activities concerned with everyone, including all motivated volunteers who are associated with directly or indirectly with BiGUS. Our intention (rigidity) to develop our self sustainable model successfully in rural sector and the result of the model share equality top to bottom. We have executed various government skill development projects under Central and State Government. The Institution is also recognized as a Vocational Training Provider (VTP) for Modular Employable Skills, approved by NCVT, affiliated by RASCI, TSSC PMKVY programme, Partner of NDLM(Digital India) Government of India and partner of NASSCOM FOUNDATION.
